alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Doddridge; Gilmer; Pleasants; Ritchie; Roane; Tyler; Wirt; Wood (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 12:02AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Washington, Pleasants, northern Calhoun, Ritchie, southwestern Doddridge, northwestern Gilmer, Wirt, Tyler, north central Roane and northeastern Wood Counties through 1230 AM EDT... At 1202 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles southeast of Caldwell to 8 miles north of Spencer. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Marietta, Spencer, Harrisville, St. Marys, Elizabeth, Middlebourne, Grantsville, Williamstown, Paden City, Sistersville, Pennsboro, Belmont, North Bend State Park, Newport, Matamoras, Ellenboro, Cairo, Macksburg, Pullman and Friendly. This includes the following highways... Interstate 77 in West Virginia between mile markers 185 and 186. Interstate 77 in Ohio between mile markers 1 and 7, and between mile markers 9 and 12, and near mile marker 15. Route 50 in West Virginia between mile markers 15 and 51. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Doddridge; Gilmer; Pleasants; Ritchie; Roane; Tyler; Wirt; Wood
